name: part_008
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Ray of Jewelry【#ホロ0期生ライブ2024】 [AUu9pSkkgaY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora performs her original song "Lucky Seven Whistle" during her 3D Live.
Hololive Generation 0 members gather on stage for a talk section and screenshot time.

subtitles.original: …未来も 私が照らすんだ
subtitles.english: ...I will light up the future too.

subtitles.original: それでも 落ち込んじゃう日は
subtitles.english: Even so, on days when I'm feeling down,

subtitles.original: 思い出しているよ みんなのその笑顔 その声を
subtitles.english: I remember everyone's smiles and voices.

subtitles.original: Happy Lucky Seven 革命
subtitles.english: Happy Lucky Seven Revolution

subtitles.original: Sunday Monday この先ずっと
subtitles.english: Sunday Monday, from now on and forever

subtitles.original: 一緒だよね 約束
subtitles.english: We'll be together, right? It's a promise.

subtitles.original: ほらね笑う 門にそら来たる
subtitles.english: See, Sora comes to those who smile.

subtitles.original: Happy Birthday 毎日がほら
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday, see, every day is...

subtitles.original: Tuesday Wednesday Lucky Day
subtitles.english: Tuesday Wednesday Lucky Day

subtitles.original: 生まれ変わっても 迷わずに
subtitles.english: Even if I'm reborn, without hesitation,

subtitles.original: 君だけの アイドルになるよ
subtitles.english: I'll become your one and only idol.

subtitles.original: 何度も見つけてね
subtitles.english: Find me again and again,

subtitles.original: セブンスホイッスル
subtitles.english: Seventh Whistle.

subtitles.original: いつ アイドルとは
subtitles.english: When they say an idol

subtitles.original: 時にあざとくが お決まりと
subtitles.english: must be "azatoi" as a rule...

subtitles.original: 誰かが言ってたけど
subtitles.english: someone said that, but

subtitles.original: 上手く 出来ないのです
subtitles.english: I can't do it very well.

subtitles.original: ねぇ もっと詰めて
subtitles.english: Hey, get closer,

subtitles.original: 私から お願い 聞いて
subtitles.english: listen to my request.

subtitles.original: 相思相愛 既読スルーなんてしないでよ
subtitles.english: Mutual love, don't just read and ignore me,

subtitles.original: 私を見て
subtitles.english: look at me.

subtitles.original: Happy Lucky Seven 革命
subtitles.english: Happy Lucky Seven Revolution

subtitles.original: Sunday Monday この先ずっと
subtitles.english: Sunday Monday, from now on and forever

subtitles.original: 一緒だよね 約束
subtitles.english: We'll be together, right? It's a promise.

subtitles.original: みんな笑う 門にそら来たる
subtitles.english: Everyone smile, Sora comes to those who smile.

subtitles.original: Happy Birthday 毎日がほら
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday, see, every day is...

subtitles.original: Tuesday Wednesday Every Day
subtitles.english: Tuesday Wednesday Every Day

subtitles.original: 7つ 全身全霊 かけて
subtitles.english: With all seven, giving it my all,

subtitles.original: ここにいる みんなのことを
subtitles.english: for everyone who is here...

subtitles.original: 永遠に愛します セブンスホイッスル
subtitles.english: I'll love you forever, Seventh Whistle.

subtitles.original: そらちゃーん！ / いぇーい！
subtitles.english: Sora-chan! / Yay!

subtitles.original: 新曲めっちゃ良かった！ / 良かったー！ / すごーい！
subtitles.english: The new song was so good! / It was great! / Amazing!

subtitles.original: 初披露！ / 初披露！
subtitles.english: First performance! / First performance!

subtitles.original: おめでたいですね。 / おめでとー！
subtitles.english: How wonderful. / Congratulations!

subtitles.original: 7周年おめでとう！ / ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Congratulations on your 7th anniversary! / Thank you!

subtitles.original: でもちょっと複雑なんだけど、0期生全員の周年ではないんですよね。
subtitles.english: It's a bit complicated, but it's not the anniversary for all of Gen 0.

subtitles.original: そうなんだよね、みんなデビュー日が違ったりからね。
subtitles.english: That's true, everyone has different debut dates.

subtitles.original: それがね、こうやって集まったということで。はぁ〜…
subtitles.english: But here we are, gathered like this. Phew...

subtitles.original: セトリとかもめちゃくちゃ考えたじゃないですか。
subtitles.english: We really thought a lot about the setlist, didn't we?

subtitles.original: そうだね、組み合わせどうしようとか。
subtitles.english: Yeah, like what combinations to do.

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃ悩んだ、大会議したよね。
subtitles.english: We agonized over it, had a big meeting.

subtitles.original: でもみこがすごいびっくりしたのは、0期生でこうやって集まっていろいろ考えると…
subtitles.english: But what really surprised Miko was, when Gen 0 gathers like this and thinks about things...

subtitles.original: もう誰かがメモを取って、誰かがまとめて、みたいな。
subtitles.english: someone takes notes, someone summarizes...

subtitles.original: すごく役割分担もしてたりとか。
subtitles.english: We even had roles assigned.

subtitles.original: みんななんか「任せるよ」っていうのがなく、こだわりがちゃんとあるから。
subtitles.english: No one just says "I'll leave it to you," everyone has their own preferences.

subtitles.original: すごい素敵だったなって。
subtitles.english: I thought it was really wonderful.

subtitles.original: チャンスだった、すごかったよ。 / 流石だったよ本当。 / 素敵だったよ。
subtitles.english: It was our chance, it was great. / You were amazing, really. / It was lovely.

subtitles.original: せっかくだから、スクショ撮りたい！
subtitles.english: Since we're all here, I want to take a screenshot!

subtitles.original: 撮りたい！スクショ撮ろう！
subtitles.english: I want to! Let's take a screenshot!

subtitles.original: 撮るぞ！ / どうやって撮る？
subtitles.english: Let's do it! / How should we pose?

subtitles.original: まずそらちゃんちょっと真ん中にいていただいて。
subtitles.english: First, Sora-chan, please stay in the middle.

subtitles.original: え、なんか上下とかになる？
subtitles.english: Should we do like high and low positions?

subtitles.original: え、待って、戦隊？ / どういう上下？
subtitles.english: Wait, like Super Sentai? / What kind of high and low?

subtitles.original: すぐにこういう時戦隊になるんだから。
subtitles.english: We always turn into a Sentai team at times like this.

subtitles.original: かん？ / はい、何のポーズ？
subtitles.english: Ready? / Okay, what pose?

subtitles.original: 分かんない！何ですかこれ？
subtitles.english: I don't know! What even is this?
